course_description: This course traces the development of Western concert dance from 19th century Romantic Ballet to the present. Emphasis will be placed on the development of American modern dance, post-modern dance, and current trends and dance artists.
sections: Class Nbr: 3306, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: A. Abarca, Status: Open
